nodes.text: Lampay Fay was a male Pau'an and the aide to Port Administrator Tion Medon on Utapau. Medon, Fay, and Zyn Javeb assisted Obi-Wan Kenobi during his search for General Grievous.

Fay was a tall, gaunt being with lined, gray skin and an imposing visage. Despite his disturbing appearance, Fay was helpful, and dealt with important duties in Pau City on Utapau. It was said that Fay's ancestors were integral to the history of Utapau, and were partially credited with the current society forged by the Pau'ans and the Utai.
Tion Medon, Zyn Javeb, and Fay greeted Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi upon his arrival in Pau City. Lampay ensured Obi-Wan's Jedi interceptor was refueled while the Administrator talked with his guest.
Lampay Fay was portrayed by an uncredited Goran D. Kleut in his film debut.
